# NSUnderlineStyle

**Structure**

Constants for the underline style and strikethrough style attribute keys.

## Declaration

```swift
struct NSUnderlineStyle
```

## Overview

Use these constants to specify the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSUnderlineStyleAttributeName] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSStrikethroughStyleAttributeName] attributes of an attributed string.

## Getting the line style

- **single**: Draw a single line.
- **thick**: Draw a thick line.
- **double**: Draw a double line.
- **patternDot**: Draw a line of dots.
- **patternDash**: Draw a line of dashes.
- **patternDashDot**: Draw a line of alternating dashes and dots.
- **patternDashDotDot**: Draw a line of alternating dashes and two dots.
- **byWord**: Draw the line only beneath or through words, not whitespace.

## Initializers

- **init(_:)**: Creates a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSUnderlineStyle] from `Text.LineStyle`.
- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates an underline style with the specified raw value.

## Getting text content attributes

- **NSWritingDirectionFormatType**: Constants for the writing direction attribute key.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Copyable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- Hashable
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
